Uses of Interface
org.jruyi.common.ICharsetCodec

  • Packages that use ICharsetCodec 
    Package Description
    org.jruyi.common
    JRuyi Common Package Version 1.0

    • Uses of ICharsetCodec in org.jruyi.common

      Methods in org.jruyi.common that return ICharsetCodec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ICharsetCodec CharsetCodec.get()
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the platform's default charset.
      ICharsetCodec CharsetCodec.IFactory.get()
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the platform's default charset.
      static ICharsetCodec CharsetCodec.get(Charset charset)
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the specified charset.
      ICharsetCodec CharsetCodec.IFactory.get(Charset charset)
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the specified charset.
      static ICharsetCodec CharsetCodec.get(String charsetName)
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the specified charset.
      ICharsetCodec CharsetCodec.IFactory.get(String charsetName)
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the specified charset.
      Methods in org.jruyi.common with parameters of type ICharsetCodec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(char[] chars, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given chars using the specified charset codec, into this BytesBuilder.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(char[] chars, int offset, int length, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given chars starting at offset ending at (offset + length) using the specified charset codec, into this BytesBuilder.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(String str, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given str using the specified charset codec, into this BytesBuilder.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(String str, int offset, int length, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given str starting at offset ending at (offset + length) using the specified charset, into this BytesBuilder.
      String BytesBuilder.getString(int start, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Decodes the sub-bytesquence starting from start(inclusive) to the end into a String using the given charsetCodec, and returns the resultant String.
      String BytesBuilder.getString(int start, int length, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Decodes the sub-bytesequence starting from start(inclusive) to (start + length)(exclusive) into a String using the given charsetCodec, and returns the resultant String.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.insert(int index, char[] chars, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Encodes the specified chars using the specified charset codec, and inserts the result into this BytesBuilder at index.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.insert(int index, char[] chars, int offset, int length, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Encodes the subsequence of the specified chars starting at offset ending at (offset + length) using the specified charset codec, and inserts the result into this BytesBuilder at index.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.insert(int index, String str, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Encodes the specified str using the specified charset codec and inserts the result into this BytesBuilder at index.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.insert(int index, String str, int offset, int length, ICharsetCodec charsetCodec)
      Encodes the substring of the specified str starting at offset ending at (offset + length) using the specified charset codec, and inserts the result into this BytesBuilder at index.
